Simulations¶

Strategies¶

Four strategies are implemented (available in Game2048.Main.Game_2048).

Random :¶

At each step, a direction is randomly chosen between the four possible.

Game2048.Main.Game_2048.random_2048(self)¶

Launches an AI game with random movements only.

Performance :¶

Clockwise :¶

Movements are chosen clockwise (the first one is random).

Game2048.Main.Game_2048.clockwise_2048(self)¶

Launches an AI game with clockwise movement (starting movement is randomized).

Performance :¶

Opposite :¶

A direction is randomly picked and alternate with its opposite one.

Game2048.Main.Game_2048.opposite_2048(self)¶

Launches an AI game with only a first random movement and its opposite one.

Performance :¶

Adjacent :¶

A random movement and one of it adjacent one alternate.

Game2048.Main.Game_2048.adjacent_2048(self)¶

Launches an AI game with only a first random movement and one of its adjacent ones.

Performance :¶

say that we made maths tests about their performance and show results

A versus mode¶

Let’s add some features graph comparaison between two chosen strategies.
